post:
SolarVM offers high quality VPS servers in The Netherlands and Kansas City, MO, USA.
We only use the best hardware and networks, and have a rich featureset.

[Click here to visit our site!](http://solarvm.com)

All our VPS include

1 Gbps Connection in NL (Tier 1) and 1 Gbps in Kansas City
High Bandwidth per VPS (can be increased)
SolusVM Control panel
OpenVZ Virtualization
Instant Setup
TUN/TAP Ready
PPP Ready
Control Panels Available


Our Plans:


Mini VPS

    256MB Dedicated RAM
    1 vCore (Xeon CPU)
    10GB Disk
    250GB Bandwidth
    1Gbps Port
    NL & US Available
    Monthly Payment: $5.00 / month


Basic VPS

    512MB Dedicated RAM
    1 vCore (Xeon CPU)
    20GB Disk
    500GB Bandwidth
    1Gbps Port
    NL & US Available
    Monthly Payment: $7.00 / month



If you have any questions please contact us at our LiveChat or support@solarvm.com
